description: Compute radial velocities from radar signals. Subscribe to /radar/scan, process radar data, and publish /radar_velocity. Core algorithm is left as TODO for LLM to fill.

todos.description: Initialize radar velocity estimation algorithm: buffers, parameters, and FFT/Doppler modules
todos.expected_outcome: Node compiles, subscribers/publishers initialized, buffers ready for radar processing

todos.description: Compute radial velocities from radar signals
todos.expected_outcome: Estimated radial velocities updated and published to /radar_velocity
